headline.main: 10 Things to Know: This Week's Takeaways 1110

docs.snippet: Playmaker Kaka received a standing ovation from the San Siro crowd after marking his 300th AC Milan appearance with two goals in a 3-0 win over hapless Chievo Verona in Serie A on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Playmaker Kaka received a standing ovation from the San Siro crowd after marking his 300th AC Milan appearance with two goals in a 3-0 win over hapless Chievo Verona in Serie A on Saturday.

headline.main: Kaka Scores Twice in 300th Game as Milan Triumph
headline.print_headline: Kaka Scores Twice in 300th Game as Milan Triumph

docs.snippet: Mr. Fibich, at first an actor, went on to specialize in Jewish dance traditions....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Fibich, at first an actor, went on to specialize in Jewish dance traditions.
docs.abstract: Felix Fibich, Polish-born modern dancer, choreographer and teacher who specialized in dances drawn from the Jewish heritage of Eastern Europe, dies at age 96.

headline.main: Felix Fibich, Dancer and Choreographer, Dies at 96

docs.snippet: If Prime Minister Tayyip Erdogan is fighting the toughest battle of his political career as corruption allegations swirl and elections approach, Turkey's conservative Anatolian heartlands appear to have his back....
docs.lead_paragraph: If Prime Minister Tayyip Erdogan is fighting the toughest battle of his political career as corruption allegations swirl and elections approach, Turkey's conservative Anatolian heartlands appear to have his back.

headline.main: Loyalty to Embattled Erdogan Lies Deep in Turkey's Pious Heartlands
headline.print_headline: Loyalty to Embattled Erdogan Lies Deep in Turkey's Pious Heartlands

docs.snippet: Chelsea suffered a shock 1-0 defeat at Crystal Palace while Manchester City were held to a 1-1 draw at Arsenal on Saturday, opening the door for Liverpool to go top of the Premier League in their home game on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chelsea suffered a shock 1-0 defeat at Crystal Palace while Manchester City were held to a 1-1 draw at Arsenal on Saturday, opening the door for Liverpool to go top of the Premier League in their home game on Sunday.

headline.main: No Honours at the Palace for Chelsea, Man City Held
headline.print_headline: No Honours at the Palace for Chelsea, Man City Held

docs.snippet: Today is Saturday, March 29, the 88th day of 2014. There are 277 days left in the year....
docs.lead_paragraph: Today is Saturday, March 29, the 88th day of 2014. There are 277 days left in the year.

docs.snippet: Proving there is no place like home, world number one Serena Williams swept past China's Li Na 7-5 6-1 in the final of the Sony Open on Saturday, collecting a record seventh win on the Miami hardcourts....
docs.lead_paragraph: Proving there is no place like home, world number one Serena Williams swept past China's Li Na 7-5 6-1 in the final of the Sony Open on Saturday, collecting a record seventh win on the Miami hardcourts.

headline.main: Williams Beats Li to Claim Seventh Miami Title
headline.print_headline: Williams Beats Li to Claim Seventh Miami Title

docs.snippet: It was long after former Penn State assistant football coach Jerry Sandusky had been arrested, tried and convicted of sexually abusing 10 boys before his wife said she realized just how much trouble he was in....
docs.lead_paragraph: It was long after former Penn State assistant football coach Jerry Sandusky had been arrested, tried and convicted of sexually abusing 10 boys before his wife said she realized just how much trouble he was in.

headline.main: Sandusky's Wife Goes on Offensive Against Accusers
headline.print_headline: Sandusky's Wife Goes on Offensive Against Accusers

docs.snippet: The former college basketball star and analyst Billy Packer played for Wake Forest in the last N.C.A.A. tournament game held at Madison Square Garden before this year....
docs.lead_paragraph: The former college basketball star and analyst Billy Packer played for Wake Forest in the last N.C.A.A. tournament game held at Madison Square Garden before this year.
docs.abstract: Former college basketball star and analyst Billy Packer recalls playing for Wake Forest in 1961, last NCAA tournament game held at Madison Square Garden until 2014; game was overshadowed by discovery of point-shaving scandal; 53-year hiatus was broken by third-round game between Connecticut and Iowa.

headline.seo: Billy Packer Relives Last Madison Square Garden Tournament Game
headline.main: Remembering a Tournament ‘Final’ at the Garden
headline.print_headline: Remembering a Tournament ‘Final’ at the Garden
